name: Shinobi Guardians
description:
Flip: If you control no Guardians on your side of the field, Summon 3 Guardians with the following stats:

● 1: (Atk: 50; HP:50)
● 2: (Atk: 50; HP:50)
● 3: (Atk: 50; HP:50)

In each of your standby phases, pay 100 gold, or destroy all 3 guards
